verses.roman:
sei saba dayālu more hañā sadaya
mora lāgi' prabhu-pade karibe vinaya

synonyms: sei saba—all of them; dayālu—merciful; more—unto me; hañā—becoming; sa-daya—favorably disposed; mora lāgi'—for me; prabhu-pade—at the lotus feet of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karibe—will do; vinaya—humble submission.
translation: "If all the devotees associated with the Lord are favorably disposed toward me, they can submit my petition at the lotus feet of the Lord.
